metadata.name: Suspicious PowerShell Invocations - Specific
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation command parameters

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-nop')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -w ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('hidden')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -c ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('[convert]::frombase64string')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -w ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('hidden')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-noni')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-nop')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -c ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('iex')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-object')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' -w ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('hidden')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-ep')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('bypass')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-enc')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('powershell')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('reg')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('add')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('hkcu\\\\software\\\\microsoft\\\\windows\\\\currentversion\\\\run')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('bypass')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-noprofile')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-windowstyle')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('hidden')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-object')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('system.net.webclient')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.download')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('iex')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-object')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('net.webclient')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.download'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('(new-object system.net.webclient).downloadstring(''https://community.chocolatey.org/install.ps1')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('(new-object system.net.webclient).downloadstring(''https://chocolatey.org/install.ps1'')')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('write-chocolateywarning'))))
